text: "Pick Up the Pieces" is a 1974 song by Scottish band Average White Band and was taken from their second studio album AWB. It went to number 1 in the United States, number 4 in Canada and number 6 in the United Kingdom. It is essentially an instrumental apart from the song's title being shouted at several points of the song. ==References== Category:1974 songs Category:Disco songs Category:Average White Band songs
title: Pick Up the Pieces (Average White Band song)
